title: Vinnie Politan Investigates
overview: Every story, every trial, every case has at least two sides. In this weekday series, Court TV's Vinnie Politan looks at every angle of the cases making headlines. Dive into the latest true crime stories inside and outside of the courtroom in Vinnie Politan Investigates. Starting Monday, you can watch VPI every weeknight at 9/8c on Court TV and CourtTV.com.Â
